Articles.Content: Obviously I\'m a new user. However I\'ve been lurking following the development of KSP since late July. I decided to join the forums now that progress on the game is kicked into overdrive. I look forward to buying this game in the future. So hello to all the fellow Kerbanauts!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
